channel.title: RMarkdown语法 on 邬小达

item.title: RMarkdown语法
item.description: 代码块 [permalinks] post = "/post/:year/:month/:day/:slug/" note = "/note/:year/:month/:day/:slug/" 索引 a foot note1 粗体 italic / bold inline code 链接 blogdown 公式 $${\sqrt {n}}\left(\left({\frac {1}{n}}\sum _{i=1}^{n}X_{i}\right)-\mu \right)\ {\xrightarrow {d}}\ N\left(0,\sigma ^{2}\right)$$ 引用 block quote Hear is the footnote↩
